name: Okay, Corral!
description:
Okay, Corral!

How to play:

Build an enclosed fence one link at a time to capture as many cows as you can. The game ends when you connect back to the start of your fence. Once you use the total number of available links (20 for fixed-length version, 15 for variable-length), each new link built will remove the oldest existing link.

Controls:

Use WASD or the arrow keys to build new fence links. Red outlines show legal moves.

Enter to return to the main menu.

Versions:

Fixed-length: every link is 5 units, with 20 total links.

Variable-length: the first link is 1 unit, the second 2 units, etc up to a maximum of 15 units. The 16th link will go back down to 1 unit, the 17th 2 units, etc.
